channel.title: How to play Runescape on Apple iPod/iPhone
channel.description:
Ok this is really simple. 3 simple steps!
Step 1: Download teamviewer on your pc (http://www.teamviewer.com/) and then download it from the app store for free.
Step 2: Find your teamviewer ID and password and type it in your device. This will connect you to your computer.
Step 3: Open up the desktop client or go to the website and play!
Please tell me what you think by voting on the poll and replying! :D
NOTE: THIS ALSO WORKS FOR RSPS AND ANYTHING ELSE YOU CAN PLAY ON YOUR COMP :)
[img]http://emob796.photobucket.com/albums/yy243/mo139026/IMG_0115.png[/img]

item.title: How to play Runescape on Apple iPod/iPhone
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Ⅽole, post:4, topic:395735”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=492923.msg3619912#msg3619912 date=1307310010]

Am I the only one who considered Jailbreaking their phone and installing Java and just using RuneScapes app?

I would do that if I could jailbreak

Theres sites that do it for you.
[/quote]
With the current firmware I’m running it’s not possible.[/quote]
They give you firmware downgrades. Its all 100% legal now so you wont get any problems from apple.

Read full topic

item.title: How to play Runescape on Apple iPod/iPhone
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“I Am Sparta, post:28, topic:395731”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=492923.msg3609480#msg3609480 date=1306435262]

You can also use the app cloud browse. It let’s you play rs straight from your iphone/ipod/ipad without having to connect to your comp.

Well I tried this app and it completely sux! You cant play rsps. You can only use it for a limited time unless you buy a premium acc 10$ a month even tho you already have to pay 3$ for the app. Trust me this app sucks.

that’s why you jailbreak your itouch and activate the app manually
[/quote]
You still have to pay 10$ a month[/quote]
no you don’t…only if you’re idiotic

Read full topic

item.title: How to play Runescape on Apple iPod/iPhone
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

Or you could download an app called AlwaysOnPc. It’s $20 from the App store, Unless you have a jailbroken ipod/iphone. Just register an account… use those details to log in and you should be able to play java games, flash games and do other shizzle. Also has better graphics… -.- But this is free and a good way of doing it, but what happens if your computer goes off?? FUCKED.

Read full topic
